data.text:
FSSAI Food Registration

FSSAI Food license or FSSAI Food Registration has it is own importance.it is issued for providing quality food. FSSAI (Food License in India) is an abbreviation used for the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India. This Food License or FSSAI Food Registration comes under the Food safety and standards act,2006, it is an autonomous body. This FSSAI Food License or Food Registration Certificate is mandatory for the business related to food like Restaurants, Hotels, and Catering, etc. All the administrative control by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. Those organizations involved in this food business must have registered for the Food Registration Certificate. And must have a 14-digit registration number .which is known as FSSAI (Food License in India) Number and printed on food packages.

This major step is taken by The Government for Food Licence Registration system to ensure the food quality and the product goes in several quality checks, this will increase the standard of the product, reducing the instances of adulteration and improve accountability of manufacturers by issuing food service license. The Brand Owner shall display the FSSAI Food License in India logo and his license number on the label of the food package. Food License issued based on the food business activities like turnover, a scale of business.

If you want to sell food products online on Flipkart, Swiggy, Zomato, Food Panda, Amazon, and Paytm then Required FSSAI Food Registration Certificate Also, Required Trademark Registration.

FSSAI Food Registration For Swiggy, FSSAI Food Registration For Zomato, FSSAI Food Registration For Food Panda, FSSAI Food Registration For Amazon, FSSAI Food Registration For Flipkart, FSSAI Food Registration For Paytm

The criteria specified in the rules are as follows

FSSAI basic registration is required for all those people who initiate to start a new business in this industry and those who have 12 lacs turnover. if the sale is increased, they can move in state FSSAI registration.
